byline.contributor: Jeremy Merrill contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.
byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and STEVE EDER

abstract: Donald Trump, preparing to meet with Republican leaders for first time as party's nominee, will be able to draw on decades of previous appearances in Washington; history of Trump's testimony in capitol reveals mix of swagger, showmanship and shifting policy rationales.
lead_paragraph: As Mr. Trump prepares for a circuit of meetings with top lawmakers, a review of his past visits to Washington shows how they resemble his current political strategy.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Trips to Capitol Hill Years Ago Foretold Themes of Campaign
headline.print_headline: Trump Honed Approach on Past Washington Trips

snippet: As Mr. Trump prepares for a circuit of meetings with top lawmakers, a review of his past visits to Washington shows how they resemble his current political strategy.
